items.description: An object that holds all the information for a specific conference.
items.title: Conference Object

___twitter.description: Contains the twitter account of the conference.
___twitter.title: Conference twitter account

___year.description: The reference of the year of the conference.
___year.title: Conference Year

___topics.description: Contains the topic of the conference, you can pick within ios, android, ui, ux.
___topics.title: Conference Topics

___startdate.description: A brief 1 sentence summary of the project.
___startdate.title: Conference Start date

___title.description: The official title of the conference.
___title.title: Conference Title

___category.description: Contains the category of the conference.
___category.title: Conference Category

___enddate.description: A brief 1 sentence summary of the project.
___enddate.title: Conference End date

___country.description: Contains the country of the conference.
___country.title: Conference Country

___callforpaper.description: Contains a flag that show if a call for paper is open.
___callforpaper.title: Conference Call for paper flag

___homepage.description: The URL for the project's homepage.
___homepage.title: Conference Homepage

___city.description: Contains the city of the conference.
___city.title: Conference City
